title: Apple adds Dutch voice recognition for Siri on HomePod with version 15.4 beta 4
content:
There is more news regarding Siri and the latest HomePod 15.4 beta 4 as Apple is also adding Dutch voice recognition for the personal assistant on its smart speaker. With that, it seems like a matter of time until the company finally releases the HomePod mini in the Netherlands.

more…

The post Apple adds Dutch voice recognition for Siri on HomePod with version 15.4 beta 4 appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Siri and the latest HomePod 15.4 beta 4 as Apple is also adding Dutch voice recognition for the personal assistant on its smart speaker.
